column3: @theuni : step 3 is needed to re-create a disk image -- the .dmg files are created as read-only-when-mounted, I can't codesign the .app in the mounted .dmg and unmount.\nAt least, I don't think I can. If I'm wrong, tell me the magic incantation....\n

Ok, that makes sense. I'm pretty sure you've had to remind me of that a few times now...

ACK on the changes. I'll try to get the Gitian signer up and running sooner than later.
